In fact , I am using heritrix with the Bow package classifier (a previous work  http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/archive-crawler/message/1905)
. the heritrix + Bow package combination works with me for a once , then when I try to repeat the same job again without any modifications , it does not download anything except the seed pages.

I do not want to duplicate jobs but even tryinga new job with different seeds do not work also.

It only works with me in case of a new heritrix installation.

Paul Jack <pjack@...> wrote:                                  This depends on a number of factors. Notably, is the configuration  
 exactly the same with your different crawls? Are you feeding a  
 previous crawl's information into a second crawl for deduplication?
 
 -Paul
 
 On Jul 25, 2007, at 9:59 AM, ahmed ghouzia wrote:
 
 > For the same seed of URLs , heritrix sometimes works fine and goes  
 > rapidly , othertimes it only dowloads the seeds and stop.
 >
 > Why is that ??
 >
